cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause ciphering configuration failure and prevent secure data transmission.

du.explanation_en: Setting do_CSIRS to a negative value -1 will cause CSI-RS configuration failure and prevent proper channel state information reporting.
du.explanation_zh: 將 do_CSIRS 設定為負值 -1 會導致 CSI-RS 配置失敗，並阻止正確的通道狀態資訊報告。
